description: A status effect that applies to an entire team, not just a single monster. Mark effects persist even when monsters are switched out. Each side can only have one positive mark and one negative mark at a time.

zh.name: 印记
zh.description: 常驻在全队的效果, 不仅仅作用于单个精灵。印记在精灵被替换下场时不会消失。每一方同时只能存在1种正面印记和负面印记。

description: Speed -10 per stack.
Recover 1 energy per stack at the end of each turn.

zh.name: 光合印记
zh.description: 每回合每层恢复1点能量。

description: Attack-type move power +10 for each stack.

zh.name: 攻击印记
zh.description: 每层使攻击技能威力+10。

description: On the first turn after entering the battlefield, move power +10.

zh.name: 蓄电印记
zh.description: 入场首回合技能威力+10。

description: All moves' energy cost -1 for each stack.

zh.name: 湿润印记
zh.description: 每层湿润印记使所有技能能耗-1。

description: When acting first, damage +20% for each stack.

zh.name: 风起印记
zh.description: 先手攻击时, 每层使伤害提升20%。

description: When acting last, damage +30% for each stack.

zh.name: 迟缓印记
zh.description: 后手攻击时, 每层使伤害提升30%。

description: When entering the battlefield, lose 1 energy per stack.

zh.name: 降灵印记
zh.description: 精灵入场时（所有情况）, 每层失去1能量。

description: When using a 5-energy move, Attack +40%. Only 1 stack can be active.

zh.name: 龙噬印记
zh.description: 释放5能耗技能时, 提升40%攻击。仅生效1层。

description: At the end of each turn, deal Poison-type damage equal to 3% of max HP per stack. The damage amount is affected by type effectiveness.

zh.name: 中毒印记
zh.description: 回合结束时, 造成3%最大生命的毒属性伤害, 受属性克制影响。

description: When entering the battlefield, take damage equal to 6% of max HP per stack.

zh.name: 棘刺印记
zh.description: 精灵入场时（所有情况）, 每层造成6%最大生命值伤害。

description: After dealing move damage, remove all stacks of Starfall Marks. Each stack deals 30 magic damage.

zh.name: 星陨印记
zh.description: 造成技能伤害后, 消除所有星陨层数, 每层星陨造成30威力的魔法伤害

description: Water-type environment. Water-type move power +50%.

zh.name: 下雨
zh.description: 水系环境。水系技能提升50%。

description: Ground-type environment. Ground-type move energy cost -2.

zh.name: 沙暴
zh.description: 地系环境。地系技能能耗-2。

description: Ice-type environment. Each turn, inflict 1 stack of Freeze on both monsters currently on the battlefield.

zh.name: 暴风雪
zh.description: 冰系环境。每回合赋予在场精灵1层冰冻效果。

description: At the end of each turn, each stack absorbs 6% of max HP from the target. All stacks are removed when the monster is switched out.

zh.name: 寄生
zh.description: 回合结束时, 每层吸取6%最大生命值, 换下场后清除。

description: This includes both the Poison and Poison Mark effects.

zh.name: 中毒效果
zh.description: 包括中毒和中毒印记效果。

description: At the end of each turn, inflict Poison-type damage equal to 3% of max HP per stack, affected by type effectiveness. All stacks are removed when the monster is switched out.

zh.name: 中毒
zh.description: 回合结束时, 造成3%最大生命的毒属性伤害, 受属性克制影响, 换下场后清除。

description: Each stack freezes 5% of the target's max HP, making it unusable. If the remaining HP falls below the frozen amount, the monster is defeated. This effect persists even after switching out.

zh.name: 冻结
zh.description: 每层效果冻结目标5%的最大生命值, 冻结部分的生命值不可用, 当生命低于冻结比例时力竭, 换下场依然存在。

description: At the end of each turn, inflict Fire-type damage equal to 2% of max HP per stack, affected by type effectiveness. The number of stacks is halved (rounded up) at the end of each turn, with a minimum reduction of 1 stack. All stacks are removed when the monster is switched out.

zh.name: 灼烧
zh.description: 回合结束时, 造成2%最大生命的火属性伤害, 受属性克制影响, 并衰减一半（向上取整）的层数, 最少衰减1层, 换下场后清除。

description: Reverts the monster to the previous stage of its evolutionary chain, lowering its base stats to the previous stage but retaining all unlocked traits. If already at the lowest stage, regression cannot proceed, and regression-related moves will not activate. This effect persists even after switching out.

zh.name: 萌化
zh.description: 变为进化链的上一阶形态, 萌化后种族值也会同步降低为上一阶形态, 但会保留已解锁的特性。最低形态时无法继续萌化, 需要萌化获得增益的技能在最低形态时不会生效, 换下场依然存在。

description: When acting for the first time after entering the battlefield, gain an extra effect.

zh.name: 进发
zh.description: 进入战场首次行动获得额外效果。

description: When a move with the Devotion effect is used, it grants an enhancement to all monsters' 'Bite' and 'Bug Swarm' moves. These enhancements can stack, and all active Devotion effects apply at the same time. Possible enhancements include: move power +20, attacks inflict 2 stacks of Poison, Lifesteal 20%, Combo count +1, and move energy cost -2.

zh.name: 奉献
zh.description: 使技能「啃咬」和「虫群」获得额外强化, 全部精灵共享, 强化效果可同时存在并叠加。效果: 技能威力+20, 攻击附加2层中毒, 吸血20%, 连击数+1, 技能能耗-2。

description: Each player has 4 Blood Points at the start of the battle. Generally, when a monster is defeated, the player loses 1 Blood Point. Some traits can have different effects on Blood Points. If a player runs out of Blood Points, they lose the battle.

zh.name: 血点
zh.description: 每位玩家在战斗开始时拥有4点魔力值。一般情况下, 当一只精灵力竭时, 玩家会失去1点魔力值。有些特性会对魔力值有不同的影响。如果玩家的魔力值耗尽, 则输掉战斗。

description: The number of turns that must pass before a move can be used again. Generally, all Defense-type moves have a cooldown of 1 turn, while moves of other types have no cooldown.

zh.name: 冷却
zh.description: 技能在再次使用前必须经过的回合数。一般情况下, 所有防御类技能的冷却为1回合, 而其他类型的技能没有冷却。

description: The base power of the move, which is used to calculate damage dealt. Modifiers to Move Power apply to all moves the monster currently has. Modifiers can stack, with each stack increasing or decreasing the total effect. All modifications are removed when the monster leaves the battlefield.

zh.name: 技能威力
zh.description: 技能的基础威力, 用于计算伤害。对技能威力的增减会影响该精灵当前所有技能, 且可叠加。切换离场时, 所有调整效果移除。

description: The amount of energy required to use each move. Modifiers to Move Energy Cost apply to all moves the monster currently has. Modifiers can stack, with each stack increasing or decreasing the total effect. All modifications are removed when the monster leaves the battlefield.

zh.name: 技能能耗
zh.description: 每个技能释放所需的能量。对技能能耗的增减会影响该精灵当前所有技能, 且可叠加。切换离场时, 所有调整效果移除。

description: Perform x consecutive attacks, where x is the number of hits. Each hit uses the move's base power.

zh.name: 连击
zh.description: 进行x次连续攻击, x为连击数, 每次攻击使用技能的基础威力。

description: The side with higher priority acts first; if priority is equal, the faster monster moves first.

zh.name: 先手
zh.description: 先手值更高的一方优先出手, 先手值相同时速度更快的一方先出手。

description: Refers to the move in the xth position, counting from top to bottom.

zh.name: x号位
zh.description: 从上到下第x个位置的技能。

description: The monster cannot act under this effect.

zh.name: 眩晕
zh.description: 精灵在此效果下无法行动。

description: This turn, the monster charges up and spends energy, becoming immune to all forced exit effects. Next turn, user can only use a move that has been charged, use Focus, or switch out. If Focus is used during the charging turn, the charge status remains.

zh.name: 蓄力
zh.description: 本回合进行蓄力并扣除能量, 期间免疫所有离场效果。下回合只可释放已蓄力技能、聚能或下场。如蓄力时释放聚能, 蓄力状态依旧存在。

description: When the opponent uses a Defense-type move, counter is successful and an extra effect is triggered.

zh.name: 应对防御
zh.description: 目标释放防御类技能时, 应对成功, 触发额外效果。

description: When the opponent uses an Attack-type move against the user, counter is successful and an extra effect is triggered.

zh.name: 应对攻击
zh.description: 目标对自身释放攻击类技能时, 应对成功, 触发额外效果。

description: When the opponent uses a Status-type move, counter is successful and an extra effect is triggered.

zh.name: 应对状态
zh.description: 目标释放状态类技能时, 应对成功, 触发额外效果。

description: If, during the turn, the opponent uses a move of a type that this move is designated to counter, Counter succeeds. When Counter succeeds, this move is immediately triggered and used with priority before other moves.

zh.name: 应对
zh.description: 若敌方本回合使用的技能为我方应对的技能类型, 则应对成功, 此时立即优先释放技能。

description: When a monster is actively switched in (not as a result of another monster's defeat), it immediately uses the first available move with this effect and sufficient energy. The turn order for this move is determined by the Speed of the two monsters on the battlefield.

zh.name: 迅捷
zh.description: 精灵主动入场时（非因其他精灵力竭而入场）, 立即使用第一个可用的技能（需满足能量要求）。此技能的先手值由在场双方精灵的速度决定。

description: Allows the monster to continue charging for one more turn. The charged move can be used one additional time.

zh.name: 积蓄
zh.description: 可继续蓄力一回合, 蓄力的技能可额外释放一次。

description: The selected move is performed twice, consuming 1 stack of Overload.

zh.name: 过载
zh.description: 所选技能释放两次, 消耗一层过载。

description: At the end of the turn, for every move with Transmission, all moves with Transmission shift down one slot in the move list, in order. Moves below them move up to take their previous positions. When multiple moves have Transmission, all such moves are shifted together, maintaining their original order relative to each other.

zh.name: 传动
zh.description: 回合结束时, 带有传动效果的技能会向下移动一个位置, 并将原先下面那个技能向上顶到传动技能原先的位置。当有多个技能同时带有传动效果时, 所有这些技能会一起移动, 并保持它们之间的原始顺序。

description: Return to the bench, then randomly select another monster to enter the battlefield. The new monster is immune to this effect.

zh.name: 紧急脱离
zh.description: 回到背包, 随机选择一只其他精灵替换入场。新入场的精灵免疫此效果。

description: Return to the bench, then manually select another monster to enter the battlefield. The new monster is immune to this effect.

zh.name: 脱离
zh.description: 回到背包, 手动选择一只其他精灵替换入场。新入场的精灵免疫此效果。

description: Return to the bench, then immediately re-enter the battlefield. This counts as the first entry for this monster. The new monster is immune to this effect.

zh.name: 返场
zh.description: 回到背包, 并再次入场, 可视为首次进入战场。新入场的精灵免疫此效果。

description: Effects that increase Attack, Defense, Speed, or move power.

zh.name: 增益
zh.description: 增加攻击、防御、速度和技能威力的效果。

description: Effects that decrease Attack, Defense, Speed, or move power.

zh.name: 减益
zh.description: 降低攻击、防御、速度和技能威力的效果。

description: Interrupts the opponent's move this turn. Opponent's move is not executed and the interrupted move's energy cost is refunded to the opponent.

zh.name: 打断
zh.description: 打断敌人本回合释放的技能。敌方技能不执行, 并返还被打断技能的能量。

description: When dealing damage, recover HP equal to a percentage of the damage dealt.

zh.name: 吸血
zh.description: 造成伤害时, 按比例回复自身的生命。
